ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Pixie Strike
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah - until 53 - I pretty much avoided Pixie Strike and used Charm Exclusively (except right after rez s etc). Slyde ... From: Christopher Sanders
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah - until 53 - I pretty much avoided Pixie Strike and used Charm
Exclusively (except right after rez's etc).

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 12:47 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Pixie Strike

Hmmm...didn't exactly read the message. Heh...all I knew was, the message
was red, and the thing kept hitting me. :)

Will they charm? Didn't try that... :)

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 1:54 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Pixie Strike


At 01:28 PM 2/7/01 -0500, you wrote:
>Do giants automatically save vs Pixie Strike?
>
>Was in a FM giant group last night that pulled 2, and the one resisted
every
>strike I threw at it...a good 5 or 6 or so.

you should have gotten the message "that [something] cannot be mezmerized
with that spell'' or
something similar to that. nothing flagged with the ''giant flag'' can be
mezzed.


>Of course, it liked me best after that. :P
>
>Atonal
